description: They are very happy to introduce their first seamless products. Knitted in Italy with the experts within the field of technical base-layers. It is designed with a 'sweat map' so that you will have ventilation where needed on the garment, during high intense activity level. The polypropylene next to skin, helps transport moisture from the body out of the garment. Wear the top with the matching Racer pant for training or skiing. Made in ITALY.
name: We Norwegians Racer Crew Neck - Mens
